mil6.3.9:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, kiṁ ekantasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ, udāhu dukkhena missan”ti?
mil6.3.9:2.1_0: “Na mayaṁ taṁ, bhante nāgasena, vacanaṁ saddahāma ‘ekantasukhaṁ nibbānan’ti, evamettha
mil6.3.9:2.1_1: mayaṁ, bhante nāgasena, paccema ‘nibbānaṁ dukkhena missan’ti, kāraṇañcettha upalabhāma
mil6.3.9:2.3_0: Ye te, bhante nāgasena, nibbānaṁ pariyesanti, tesaṁ dissati kāyassa ca cittassa ca
mil6.3.9:2.3_1: ātāpo paritāpo ṭhānacaṅkamanisajjāsayanāhārapariggaho middhassa ca uparodho āyatanānañca
mil6.3.9:2.4_0: Ye keci loke sukhitā sukhasamappitā, te sabbepi pañcahi kāmaguṇehi āyatane ramenti
mil6.3.9:2.4_1: brūhenti, manāpikamanāpikabahuvidhasubhanimittena rūpena cakkhuṁ ramenti brūhenti,
mil6.3.9:2.5: Tumhe taṁ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyamanobrūhanaṁ hanatha upahanatha, chindatha upacchindatha, rundhatha uparundhatha.
mil6.3.9:2.6: Tena kāyopi paritapati, cittampi paritapati, kāye paritatte kāyikadukkhavedanaṁ vediyati, citte paritatte cetasikadukkhavedanaṁ vedayati.
mil6.3.9:2.7: Nanu māgaṇḍiyopi paribbājako bhagavantaṁ garahamāno evamāha ‘bhūnahu samaṇo gotamo’ti.
mil6.3.9:2.8: Idamettha kāraṇaṁ, yenāhaṁ kāraṇena brūmi ‘nibbānaṁ dukkhena missan’”ti.
mil6.3.9:3.1: “Na hi, mahārāja, nibbānaṁ dukkhena missaṁ, ekantasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ.
mil6.3.9:3.2_0: Yaṁ pana tvaṁ, mahārāja, brūsi ‘nibbānaṁ dukkhan’ti, netaṁ dukkhaṁ nibbānaṁ nāma,
mil6.3.9:3.2_1: nibbānassa pana sacchikiriyāya pubbabhāgo eso, nibbānapariyesanaṁ etaṁ, ekantasukhaṁyeva,
mil6.3.9:3.6: “Api nu kho taṁ, mahārāja, rajjasukhaṁ dukkhena missan”ti?
mil6.3.9:3.8_0: “Kissa pana te, mahārāja, rājāno paccante kupite tesaṁ paccantanissitānaṁ paṭisedhāya
mil6.3.9:3.8_1: amaccehi pariṇāyakehi bhaṭehi balatthehi parivutā pavāsaṁ gantvā ḍaṁsamakasavātātapapaṭipīḷitā
mil6.3.9:3.8_2: samavisame paridhāvanti, mahāyuddhañca karonti, jīvitasaṁsayañca pāpuṇantī”ti?
mil6.3.9:3.9_0: “Netaṁ, bhante nāgasena, rajjasukhaṁ nāma, rajjasukhassa pariyesanāya pubbabhāgo
mil6.3.9:3.9_1: eso, dukkhena, bhante nāgasena, rājāno rajjaṁ pariyesitvā rajjasukhaṁ anubhavanti,
mil6.3.9:3.9_2: evaṁ, bhante nāgasena, rajjasukhaṁ dukkhena amissaṁ, aññaṁ taṁ rajjasukhaṁ, aññaṁ dukkhan”ti.
mil6.3.9:3.10: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, ekantasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ, na dukkhena missaṁ.
mil6.3.9:3.11_0: Ye pana taṁ nibbānaṁ pariyesanti, te kāyañca cittañca ātāpetvā ṭhānacaṅkamanisajjāsayanāhāraṁ
mil6.3.9:3.11_1: pariggahetvā middhaṁ uparundhitvā āyatanāni paṭipīḷetvā kāyañca jīvitañca pariccajitvā
mil6.3.9:3.11_2: dukkhena nibbānaṁ pariyesitvā ekantasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ anubhavanti, nihatapaccāmittā
mil6.3.9:3.12: Evaṁ, mahārāja, ekantasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ, na dukkhena missaṁ, aññaṁ nibbānaṁ, aññaṁ dukkhanti.
mil6.3.9:4.1: Aparampi, mahārāja, uttariṁ kāraṇaṁ suṇohi ekantasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ, na dukkhena missaṁ, aññaṁ dukkhaṁ, aññaṁ nibbānanti.
mil6.3.9:4.2: Atthi, mahārāja, ācariyānaṁ sippavantānaṁ sippasukhaṁ nāmā”ti?
mil6.3.9:4.4: “Api nu kho taṁ, mahārāja, sippasukhaṁ dukkhena missan”ti?
mil6.3.9:4.6_0: “Kissa pana te, mahārāja, ācariyā ācariyānaṁ abhivādanapaccuṭṭhānena udakāharaṇagharasammajjanadantakaṭṭhamukhodakānuppadānena
mil6.3.9:4.7_0: “Netaṁ, bhante nāgasena, sippasukhaṁ nāma, sippapariyesanāya pubbabhāgo eso, dukkhena,
mil6.3.9:4.7_1: bhante nāgasena, ācariyā sippaṁ pariyesitvā sippasukhaṁ anubhavanti, evaṁ, bhante
mil6.3.9:4.7_2: nāgasena, sippasukhaṁ dukkhena amissaṁ, aññaṁ taṁ sippasukhaṁ, aññaṁ dukkhan”ti.
mil6.3.9:4.8: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, ekantasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ, na dukkhena missaṁ.
mil6.3.9:4.9_0: Ye pana taṁ nibbānaṁ pariyesanti, te kāyañca cittañca ātāpetvā ṭhānacaṅkamanisajjāsayanāhāraṁ
mil6.3.9:4.9_1: pariggahetvā middhaṁ uparundhitvā āyatanāni paṭipīḷetvā kāyañca jīvitañca pariccajitvā
mil6.3.9:4.9_2: dukkhena nibbānaṁ pariyesitvā ekantasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ anubhavanti, ācariyā viya sippasukhaṁ.
mil6.3.9:4.10: Evaṁ, mahārāja, ekantasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ, na dukkhena missaṁ, aññaṁ dukkhaṁ, aññaṁ nibbānan”ti.
